trophies.trophyDetail: Survive, fight, manipulate, and escape - or serve your full sentence. Unlock all trophies and prove your mastery of life behind bars.
Complete the main quest "First Steps" by meeting the Gang Leader and proving your loyalty with your first task. This is just the beginning of your journey.
Complete the main quest "Supply Sabotage" by secretly swapping the boxes and interfering with an important delivery. A single move can shift the prison’s balance of power.
Complete the main quest "Find the Informant" by uncovering the prisoner who has been leaking information to the guards. Trust is rare in prison—secrets are even rarer.
Enter the Fight Tournament and take your first step toward becoming the most feared fighter in the prison yard.
Sign up for the Darts Tournament and test your skills. In a place where precision means survival, every throw counts.
Complete the main quest "Library Research" by assisting the Librarian in organizing books. Sometimes, knowledge is the greatest weapon.
Take down at least one inmate in Block A before time runs out. In this brutal world, only the strongest command respect.
Complete the main quest "The Rare Book" by tracking down a lost book and returning it to the Librarian. Even behind bars, some things hold unexpected value.
Win a round of Blackjack and walk away with at least 50 chips. Luck is fleeting, but a sharp mind always finds an edge.
Complete the main quest "Correspondence" by collecting letters from inmates and discreetly delivering them to the Librarian. In prison, even words can be smuggled.
Complete the side quest "Find and Deliver an Item" by locating a requested object and ensuring it reaches the right hands. Every favor comes with a price.

Complete the main quest "Escape Through the Medical Ward" by earning the trust of the Doctor, distributing medicine to inmates, and reporting back. The first step to freedom is knowing the right people.
Complete the side quest "Beat Up an Inmate" by delivering a message the old-fashioned way. Violence isn't just a tool here—it’s a language.
Complete the main quest "Medical Supplies" by tracking down a specific inmate, roughing them up, and delivering the stolen medicine to the Doctor. In a place like this, healing comes at a cost.
Complete the side quest "Deliver the Package" by successfully sneaking a package to its recipient. Some deliveries are more dangerous than others.
Outsmart your opponent and claim victory in a game of Tic-Tac-Toe. Even in the harshest places, the mind remains the most dangerous weapon.
Fight your way through the tournament and claim victory, proving you are the ultimate warrior within these walls.
Rise through the Darts Tournament ranks and secure the win. Precision and patience can mean the difference between triumph and defeat.
Complete the main quest "Janitor’s Secrets" by assisting the prison janitor with various cleaning tasks. Even the most overlooked jobs can reveal hidden truths.
Complete the main quest "Blackmail the Deputy" by uncovering old letters and reports, then using them to gain leverage. In prison, information is worth more than gold.
Endure the hardships of prison life and serve your entire sentence without escaping. Few can withstand the weight of time, but you did.
Complete the main quest "Final Escape Stage" by emerging from the tunnel and stepping into the outside world. The prison walls are behind you, but freedom always comes with a price.
